name: Firefox SSL Identification fix
description: The SLL icon on the search bar is too big for my taste (specially on the FF addons webpage). This just reduces its size, now being as compacted as possible with all information needed.
additional_info:
Credits:
This stylish was based on "ffox 3 change ssl notifcations in addressbar" by brotbuexe, created in 2008. You should try it.

The only difference is that "verifiedIdentity" and "verifiedDomain" are now transparent which looks better with the current FXChrome appearance, in my humble opinion.
